Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Division. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affcet my trip?

Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Division.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

  • Shuttle buses are available from Grand to Damen to provide connecting service in both directions until 02:30 a.m.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
